title: Ariat Men's Flame Resistant M4 Relaxed Workhorse Boot Cut Pant
description: LOW-RISE PANTS: Designed for durability, added comfort, and style, the flame-resistant pants are made with cotton and nylon fabric mix. These low-rise, boot cut pants have a relaxed fit on the waist, hip, and thigh.

UTILITY POCKETS: The work pants for men come with a utility and multi-tool pocket for versatility. You can easily carry small tools like a pocket-knife and other small essentials as well as keys, mobile, money, cards, etc.

FLAME-RESISTANT PANTS: The durable FR boot cut pants are comfortable and engineered with flame-resistant technology for use in hazardous work environments. They are CAT 2, ATPV 12.7 cal/cm2, NFPA 70E, and NFPA 2112 approved.
GREAT GIFT FOR MEN: Whether you are shopping for your boyfriend, husband, or friend these low-rise men’s pants are a perfect gift option. They are easy to wash and maintain for hassle-free upkeep.

SCIENCE OF INNOVATION: Ariat excels in advanced technologies to deliver products that outperform in various conditions. Partnering with world-class biomechanical research groups and testing labs, Ariat strives to improve performance, comfort, and durability.

Jeans that can handle the heat. The 100% ring spun cotton denim is flame resistant and hrc 2 rated. They're dark washed with light hand sanding and tacking to give them a worn in look. Tailored with a lower-rise waist, straight leg opening and extra relaxed fit through the thigh. These jeans feature no-rub comfort inseams, extra deep front pockets and anchored belt loops. Apt 20, NFPA 70e, NFPA 2112 rated.
